title: Strengthening Programming Practical Competencies: Play-Based Design Strategies for Digital Tools in Early Childhood Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more core design principles of digital tools for early childhood mathematics education.
Learners can analyze educational effectiveness by applying play-based learning activities in simulated environments.
Learners can propose specific methods for integrating play elements of digital tools with the curriculum.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
